result.execSummary:
The defendant Alan T Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Consecutive to 10CT583.
**3/24/2016 Honorable John Siefert-probation term commuted to one (1)  year.

miscConds.notes:
- provide a DNA sample
Court ordered defendant pay all costs, fees, assessments and surcharges by 3/4/2019 or 20 days in HOC
- no driving without a valid license

timeConds.notes: - install an ignition interlock device on any car the defendant becomes eligible to drive during the 2 years of probation

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alan T Smith

defendant.name: Smith, Alan T
defendant.address: 11800 West Forest Home Avenue, Franklin, WI 53132

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Decison and Order Denying Request for Sentence Modification, signed and filed.
Per Order of Presiding Judge, Misdemeanor Division, this request/motion is hereby assigned to the Hon. John Siefert, Br. 47, for review. mag
Defendant's pro se request for sentence modification in 10CT000583 and 15CM002363.
Court signed order commuting probation term to ONE YEAR pursuant to section 973.09(2m), Stats. Copies forwarded to all parties.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo.  Defendant Alan T Smith in custody.  Intern Sam Tufford under the supervision of ADA Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements made by the parties.  
Court withheld sentencing and placed defendant on 2 years probation consecutive to 10CT583.  Conditions of probation are as follows:
-  no arrest for OWI
- no driving without a valid license
- install an ignition interlock device on any car the defendant becomes eligible to drive during the 2 years of probation
- provide a DNA sample
Court ordered defendant pay all costs, fees, assessments and surcharges by 3/4/2019 or 20 days in HOC
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief and Pretrial Incarceration Credit received and filed in case no. 10CT583.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo.  Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Hearing called by the court regarding his bail status.  Defendant is in court for a jury trial on case no. 10CT583.  Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department until the next court date.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   WCS report received and filed.  State's motion to adjourn is granted.   Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 47  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 47.  Court set as a nonmonetary condition of bail : Defendant to install an IID on any vehicle driven by him.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. WCS report received and filed.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court grants defendant's request for substitution of attorney Kristian Lindo  for attorney R. Thomey.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw is taken under advisment by the Court.  Court ordered case adjourned for status on counsel   in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 10-05-2015 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-17-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
WCS report received and filed.

Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-09-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 47. lr  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 08-26-2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Alan T Smith in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner.  Defendant Alan T Smith in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bvj  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
